meanings.definition: A device used for making telephone calls.
meanings.sent1: I lost my fone in the park.
meanings.sent2: She answered the fone on the first ring.
meanings.sent3: The fone rang just as I was about to leave.
meanings.sent4: His fone was his lifeline in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The bright red fone stood out among the clutter on the table.

meanings.sent1: Can you fone me when you arrive?
meanings.sent2: I will fone you after the meeting.
meanings.sent3: He foned his friend to share the good news.
meanings.sent4: She foned for help when her car broke down.
meanings.sent5: Remember to fone ahead to make a reservation.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Vietnam.
meanings.sent1: He exchanged dollars for fones before the trip.
meanings.sent2: The price was quoted in fones instead of dollars.
meanings.sent3: She collected different fones from her travels.
meanings.sent4: The value of the fone fluctuated in the market.
meanings.sent5: The souvenir shop accepted payment in fones.
